name: crypto-buddy
description: Alerting system for cryptocurrencies via Discord.

DISCORD_BOT_PREFIX.description: The prefix you're wishing to use to communicate with your Discord Bot.

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: Existing Discord Developers Bot Token that is being used for your server.

DISCORD_BOT_CHANNEL_ID.description: ID pertaining to the Discord channel you want alerts to arrive at.

DISCORD_BOT_INTERVAL.description: The time in seconds the Discord Bot will check cryptocurrency prices.
